opinion:
540 U.S. 939

KISKA CONSTRUCTION CORPORATION-USA ET AL.
v.
WASHINGTON METROPOLITAN AREA TRANSIT AUTHORITY.

No. 03-66.

Supreme Court of United States.

Appeal from the C. A. D. C. Cir.

2

Motion of General Contractors Assocation of New York, Inc., for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 321 F. 3d 1151.
